title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
summary: Harry Potter discovers he is a wizard on his 11th birthday and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
summary: Harry returns to Hogwarts and investigates a series of attacks linked to a mysterious chamber hidden in the school.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
summary: Harry learns that dangerous prisoner Sirius Black has escaped Azkaban and may be coming for him.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
summary: Harry is unexpectedly entered into the dangerous Triwizard Tournament and faces deadly challenges.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
summary: Harry and friends form a secret group to fight against the dark forces as the Ministry denies Voldemort's return.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
summary: Harry discovers a mysterious book and learns more about Voldemort’s past while dark forces close in.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione leave Hogwarts to find and destroy Voldemort’s Horcruxes in the final battle.

title: The Auction
summary: A popular Harry Potter fanfiction about a magical auction that turns into a dark and thrilling adventure.

title: Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality
summary: Harry is raised in a scientific, rational environment and approaches magic with logic and skepticism.

title: James Potter and the Hall of Elders' Crossing
summary: A fanfiction following James Potter's adventures in the Hall of Elders' Crossing, full of magic and intrigue.
